page.shortlink: api inet namespace socket class send file method
page.description: The INET::Socket::SendFile() method sends the specified file.
page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = SendFile(FileName as C [, Flush = .t. as L])

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: TRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.).

argument.name: FileName
argument.description: The path and name of a file to send.
